spiritsExplanation:
The workout is classified primarily under "High-Energy & Intense" with a score of 0.9. The description emphasizes sprint pace during intervals and max effort at the finish, indicating a fast-paced and highly exertive session. The playlist features rock songs with high energy, further supporting this classification.

The "Outdoor & Adventure" spirit is also present with a score of 0.8, as the image shows the workout occurring on a river, incorporating natural elements into the session. This setup naturally aligns with exploration and environmental challenges typical of outdoor workouts.

"Structured & Disciplined" is scored at 0.6 due to the workout's interval format and maximum rhythm specification (32 strokes per minute), suggesting methodical training and adherence to precise performance metrics.

The "Soothing & Restorative" and "Flow & Rhythm" spirits were excluded due to the high intensity and structured nature of the session, which do not prioritize relaxation or continuous, smooth movement. "Sport & Agility" was also not chosen, as there are no explicit mentions of agility or sports-specific skills.
